#summary Explanation and example of the "prefixes.ini" file.

----
= Explanation =

The "prefixes.ini" file holds short text that you'd normally find at the start of map name. For example, the text in question would be what is highlighted below.

  * *cs`_`*assault (cs`_`)
  * *de`_`*dust (de`_`)
  * *fy`_`*ice (fy`_`)
  * *awp`_`*mountaintop (awp`_`)



----
= Example =

_*prefixes.ini*_
{{{
cs_
de_
as_
fy_
kz_
ka_
xmas_
}}}
